title: Schools and nursery schools rated good or outstanding

editions.title: Schools and nursery schools rated good or outstanding
editions.summary: Percentage of state-funded provided for schools that are rated
editions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of state-funded Nursery schools, Primary schools, Secondary schools, Alternative Provision (AP) schools and Special schools that are rated.
editions.creator: https://staging.idpd.uk/publishers/department-for-education

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The statistical geography of the observation being measured.

columns.name: areanm
columns.description: The area name associated with the statistical geography.

columns.name: geography
columns.description: The geography type of the area.

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type asscoiated with the observation value.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit of measure of observation value.

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound.

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound.

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value, if needed.
